* Posit Gray  #404041
* Pure White  #FFFFFF

* Posit Burgundy  #9A4665

## Typography

> Please use [Open Sans](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Open+Sans "https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Open+Sans"), and see the [brand guidelines](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1uc_A8b4eCTyC37fCTBtAQYWJL0IejVpM/view?usp=share_link "https://drive.google.com/file/d/1uc_A8b4eCTyC37fCTBtAQYWJL0IejVpM/view?usp=share_link") for helpful guidance on font style usage.
>
> If you are limited to web-safe fonts, please use Arial. For monospace font use [Source Code Pro](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Source+Code+Pro "https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Source+Code+Pro").
